title: A2159 - liquid damage, no power - repaired liquid damage, no power but no video/tb
message:
A2159 came in for no power, liquid damage(see attached image).  I cleaned the corrosion from those two locations, and noted that the USBC pins on the power board were burnt from the event, so I replaced that board.  Machine now draws reasonable current, running at 20v properly.  I have a hot CPU, cooling fans, everything.  Startup chime sounds, caps lock working so I think the device is booted into the OS, but I have no touch bar operation(is completely black) and no video on the LCD panel, and no video output via USBc>>hdmi.

Where might I go on from here?

title: A2159 - liquid damage, no power - repaired liquid damage, no power but no video/tb
message:
Possibly something else affected by liquid.
External video is controlled through U2800 (TBT); may have accumulated crap underneath.

Do you get 3V3/5V_S0SW_LCD?
Also check power rails of J5100/10.

title: A2159 - liquid damage, no power - repaired liquid damage, no power but no video/tb
message: I have 3V3/5V_S0SW_LCD.  I do not have power on J5100/10.

title: A2159 - liquid damage, no power - repaired liquid damage, no power but no video/tb
message: Did you try known good LCD assembly?

title: A2159 - liquid damage, no power - repaired liquid damage, no power but no video/tb
message: This is a A2159.  Will an LCD panel from a A2338 work?  I have one of those I can test with.

title: A2159 - liquid damage, no power - repaired liquid damage, no power but no video/tb
message:
Don't do that mystake!
Especially in reverse way; an Intel screen assembly usually kills the M1 CPU.

title: A2159 - liquid damage, no power - repaired liquid damage, no power but no video/tb
message: OK, that's why I asked haha.  ok, I'll just buy a screen for testing.

title: A2159 - liquid damage, no power - repaired liquid damage, no power but no video/tb
message: OK, I tried it with a display I purchased from Mobile Sentrix and still no video.  I'm ASSUMING that display is good, I've not yet gotten a bad one from them.[ATTACH type="full"]61433[/ATTACH]

title: A2159 - liquid damage, no power - repaired liquid damage, no power but no video/tb
message:
OK, a display from Mobile Sentrix, but still not working.  I may be on to something though...  this is right where the damage was - see image.
I also have 12v on C8401p1, but no voltage on c8410p1
[ATTACH type="full" alt="rossmann2.png"]61434[/ATTACH]

title: A2159 - liquid damage, no power - repaired liquid damage, no power but no video/tb
message: Then rebuild the broken trace; use bypass wire.

title: A2159 - liquid damage, no power - repaired liquid damage, no power but no video/tb
A2159 - liquid damage, no power - repaired liquid damage, no power but no video/tb
message: Trace repaired.  I now have .135v on C8411p1.  Should I have 12v there with power connected but screen disconnected?

title: A2159 - liquid damage, no power - repaired liquid damage, no power but no video/tb
message: No; screen must be connected, to enable backlight circuit.
